GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/a.description: Returns day-wise livestream analytics data for the specified time range.

parameters.description: Specify the start time range in ISO format to access the livestream analytics.
parameters.name: start_time

parameters.description: Specify the end time range in ISO format to access the livestream analytics.
parameters.name: end_time

date.description: The livestream timestamp, provided in ISO format.

total_ingest_seconds.description: Total time duration for which the input was given or the meeting was streamed.

total_viewer_seconds.description: Total view time for which the viewers watched the stream.

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/a.summary: Fetch day-wise analytics data for your livestreams

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/a.description: Returns livestream analytics for the specified time range.

parameters.description: Specify the start time range in ISO format to access the livestream analytics.
parameters.name: start_time

parameters.description: Specify the end time range in ISO format to access the livestream analytics.
parameters.name: end_time

total_ingest_seconds.description: Total time duration for which the input was given or the meeting was streamed.

total_viewer_seconds.description: Total view time for which the viewers watched the stream.

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/a.summary: Fetch complete analytics data for your livestreams

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/l.description: Returns details of livestreams associated with the given organization ID. It includes livestreams created by your organization and RealtimeKit meetings that are livestreamed by your organization. If you only want details of livestreams created by your organization and not RealtimeKit meetings, you can use the `exclude_meetings` query parameter.

parameters.description: Exclude the RealtimeKit meetings that are livestreamed.
parameters.name: exclude_meetings

parameters.description: Number of results per page.
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: The page number from which you want your page search results to be displayed.
parameters.name: page_no

parameters.description: Specifies the status of the operation.
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: Specify the start time range in ISO format to access the live stream.
parameters.name: start_time

parameters.description: Specify the end time range in ISO format to access the live stream.
parameters.name: end_time

parameters.description: Specifies the sorting order for the results.
parameters.name: sort_order

POST /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/.description: Creates a livestream for the given organization ID and returns ingest server, stream key, and playback URL. You can pass custom input to the ingest server and stream key, and freely distribute the content using the playback URL on any player that supports HLS/LHLS.

ingest_server.description: The server URL to which the RTMP encoder should send the video and audio data.

playback_url.description: The web address that viewers can use to watch the livestream.

stream_key.description: Unique key for accessing each livestream.
